entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending in the morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late in the afternoon. Temperature steady near 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Saturday 22 April 2023
